text: Labour took the most seats, and gained an overall majority Elections to the West Lothian District Council took place in May 1988, alongside elections to the councils of Scotland's various other districts. The number of seats and the total vote share won by each party is listed below. Voter turnout was 49.0%. ==References== Category: West Lothian Council elections Category:1988 Scottish local elections
title: 1988 West Lothian District Council election
